title: ANGELS WITH DIRTY FACES.
content:
Hey typo addicts! I would just like to know what is the font printed in Sugababe's album "ANGELS WITH DIRTY FACES." I think it's a pretty simple and common font (but I just love it so much), it's so retro or something. I hope someone could help me out! Thanks a million!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215101725im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Angelwithnofaces_5921.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215101725im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Angelswithdirtyfaces_5137.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215101725im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dontchafreaklikme_4211.jpg)
author: sombers_eye

comments.content:
It looks to me like Goudy Heavyface.

(moving this thread to TypeID)
Thanks Zara but where exactly can i get it for free? thanks once again!

[[http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=cooper+black&x=0&y=0&sample\_text=sugerbabes%20angels%20with%20dirty%20faces|Cooper Black]] is similar, you might already have it on your system.

oh and here is [GoudyHeavyface](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215101725/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Goudy+Heavyface&x=17&y=12&sample_text=sugerbabes%20angels%20with%20dirty%20faces) (not free)
Thanks Simon, i got that Goudy Heavyface font for free already!!!

it's from this site [http://www.fontyukle.com/en/ara.php?ara=goudy](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215101725/http:/www.fontyukle.com/en/ara.php?ara=goudy "http://www.fontyukle.com/en/ara.php?ara=goudy"), i don't know if it is legal. I think it is, isn't it?
i dunno, it seems pretty suss to me... there is no mention of a foundry or type designer...
i usually download fonts for free like from 1001freefonts.com and sites like this, is that illegal?

This fontyukle-site is verrrrrrrrry suspicous, it offers many commercial fonts for free, illegally as it seems.

Kenneth: Asking for a free font when it comes to commercial fonts is like asking for a free download for the latest music-album. Illegal. You donâ€™t do that, do you? Most of the people here are living by designing beautiful things, many of them by designing typefaces. It is like a slap in their face if the people come here and asking for free downloads for their hard work. Respect them please.

there is a list of places to get, high quality fonts (free & legal) here:

[http://typophile.com/node/14652](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215101725/http:/typophile.com/node/14652 "http://typophile.com/node/14652")

also try doing a search on MyFonts like this:

[http://new.myfonts.com/search/lowest\_price%3A%5B\*+TO+0%5D/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215101725/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/lowest_price%3A%5B*+TO+0%5D/fonts/ "http://new.myfonts.com/search/lowest\_price%3A%5B\*+TO+0%5D/fonts/")

"is like asking for a free download for the latest music-album. Illegal."

USUALLY illegal.

With fonts, like music, there are great freebies to be had here and there, but most of it is work created by people earning a living by creating and selling the work.
